title: FK 6725 Tulip Lounge Chair Black
body: Inspired by the 1964 design of Preben Frabricius & Jorgen Kastholm, this Mobelaris style FK 6725 Tulip Lounge Chair is a unique masterpiece. Manufactured with the highest quality stainless steel and a frame covered with a thick canvas material to support the sumptuous Premium Aniline cushions.
